title: x/build/watcher: crashing after finding commit in two branches
body:
Yo, @adg, the watcher is crash-looping with:

```
2016/07/20 13:52:30 Watcher exiting after failure: found commit we already knew about: 1d2ca9e30c22bc9e8cd0b21dff58367443696c91("doc/go1.7.html: start sentence on a new line"); first seen on dev.garbage, now on master
```

/cc @quentinmit
